TopicTitle: Please a Maneuver Planning mode only!

Articles.Content:
When I am doing inter-planetary trasnfers I would love a 'Maneuver Planning Mode'. Make a key bindable to it. It would show only your node (you could not select anything else) and your target planet. I don't need my periapsis or the son's apoapsis. Just the basics. I have spent 10 mins having to zoom in to re-select my maneuver node - not to mention sometimes it would disappear!

See image clutter ..

It is definitly something that have been asked often as it is a pain to deal with.

At the moment you may consider the use a mods such as:

Precise node

Maneuver Node Improvement
When I'm planning a maneuver node, it's almost always to set my apoapsis, periapsis, or one of my nodes. If anything, I'd like a key to SHOW that information, not hide it.
